channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Full SNAP benefits start to go out even as the Trump administration appeals
item.description: A federal judge ordered the government to fully fund food aid by Friday. The Trump administration's appeal was denied, so it's asking appealed, saying...

item.title: FAA order cutting thousands of flights kicks in as airlines scramble to comply
item.description: The FAA ordered airlines to cut thousands of flights beginning Friday as the agency deals with air traffic controller shortages during the government ...

item.title: Supreme Court freezes order requiring Trump admin. to provide full SNAP payments
item.description: Supreme Court Justice Ketanji Brown Jackson on Friday froze, for now, a lower court order that required the Trump administration to swiftly provide fu...

item.title: For Ukraine's war wounded, an appeal for help and hope
item.description: A new documentary, "Second Wind," highlights Ukraine's wounded veterans, following four amputee soldiers and a female sniper, as they climb Mount Kili...

item.title: 'They went and never came back': Honouring Kenya's forgotten World War soldiers
item.description: Thousands of Kenyans, who fought for Britain, are buried in unknown locations and were never commemorated.

item.title: DNA pioneer James Watson dies at 97
item.description: The Nobel Prize winner felt ostracised by the scientific community over his comments on race and intelligence.

item.title: Miami-Dade sheriff's deputy fatally shot after responding to crash, officials say
item.description: Deputy Devin Jaramillo responded to a traffic crash when he was "brutally attacked and murdered," Miami-Dade Sheriff Rosie Cordero-Stutz said.

item.title: Judge permanently blocks Trump from deploying National Guard to Portland
item.description: In late September, President Trump announced he would be deploying federal troops to Portland in response to downtown protests over the administration...

item.title: Traveling soon? What the FAA's flight reductions could mean for you
item.description: The FAA is cutting 10% of air traffic at 40 of the nation's busiest airports, canceling hundreds of flights and creating uncertainty for many more pas...

item.title: James Watson, who co-discovered the structure of DNA, has died at age 97
item.description: James Watson, who co-discovered the structure of DNA has died at age 97. He was a scientific superstar until he made racist remarks that made him an o...

item.title: OpenAI's new web browser has ChatGPT baked in. That's raising some privacy questions
item.description: The Atlas browser can act as your "agent" online, doing tasks like shopping or booking tickets. But that gives it access to a lot of personal informat...

item.title: As millions of Americans struggle with SNAP lapses, food banks are swamped with demand
item.description: At one food pantry in Boston, the spike in demand means there's now a two-week wait for some to receive food, stressing needy families as well as pant...

item.title: Judge rules Trump administration failed to meet legal requirements for deploying troops to Portland
Israel receives coffin Hamas says contains body of Gaza hostage
item.description: If the body is identified as a hostage, five dead hostages will remain in Gaza and still need to be returned under a ceasefire deal.

item.title: Ugandans welcome war crimes charges against LRA leader Joseph Kony and demand his arrest
item.description: The warlord remains at large but victims hope the ICC charges will renew efforts to capture him.

item.title: British ex-soldier arrested over alleged murder of Kenyan woman in 2012
item.description: Robert James Purkiss faces extradition over allegations he murdered Agnes Manjiru.

item.title: US airlines cancel 1,000 flights while complying with shutdown order
item.description: Anxious travelers across the U.S. are feeling a bit of relief as airlines have mostly stayed on schedule while gradually cutting flights because of th...

item.title: Trump administration asks Supreme Court to halt order providing full SNAP payments for November
